None.Name: Gaze of the Watcher
None.Description: Every 3 seconds, unit casts an energy ray that jumps from one enemy to the next. Deals 180 damage to the first target while the following targets will receive continuously less damage.

None.Name: Stasis Field
None.Description: Activate to paralyze enemies within a 25m radius for 10 seconds. After the effect wears off, targets are immune against Paralyze for a while. Reusable every 10 seconds.

Extra.en: Primeval Watcher's basic attacks jump to up to 4 targets after the first,  the first jump dealing only 240 damage,  the second 160,  the third 106 and the fourth 71.
